conbody.p: processorsList PivoterList PivoteroverviewThe List Pivoter pivots data in a list field and creates a record for each item in the list.
The List Pivoter processor pivots the data in one field.

When you configure the List Pivoter, you specify the list field to pivot and whether you want the existing fields in a record incorporated in the resulting record. You can define the field name for the results. You can also configure the action to take when the list field does not exist.
